privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_page.intro: Nomad PDR System ('we') is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy_page.section_1_text: The entity responsible for processing your data is: [COMPANY_NAME], VAT ID [COMPANY_TAX_ID], located at [COMPANY_ADDRESS]. Privacy contact: [CONTACT_EMAIL].
privacy_page.section_2_text: We collect Name, Email, Phone, and vehicle details for 'Customer Management'. We also collect technical data and anonymous usage statistics (via Vercel Analytics) to improve service. Legal basis: pre-contractual steps and legitimate interest.
privacy_page.section_3_text: Data is used exclusively to: (a) Respond to your quote request; (b) Schedule services; (c) Comply with legal obligations. We do not use your data for marketing without explicit consent.
privacy_page.section_4_text: We do not sell your data. We share info only with essential service providers (e.g., Vercel for hosting/analytics and Resend for emails), under confidentiality agreements.
privacy_page.section_5_text: You have the right to: Access your data; Request rectification or deletion; Restrict processing; and Data portability. To exercise these rights, please email us.
privacy_page.section_6_text: We use essential cookies and performance technologies for website functionality. We implement security measures (such as SSL encryption) to protect your data.
